case.state: I'm Rosa, and I'm here to- oh, am I interrupting a game?
No matter if- wait, they didn't tell me that I was late! Sorry!
No matter if it's a Pokémon battle or a strip poker game, I'll do my best!
I'm Rosa, and I'm here to face all sorts of opponents!
Wait, who owns that car? And how did you get it inside?
So, is the owner of that car inside or...?
Oh, Elesa is here too?
Oh, it's you again! Didn't expect to see you in a place like this.
El Shaggy Blanco! Me he enfrentado a un número incontable de oponentes, pero esta será, sin duda alguna, la batalla más difícil que jamás haya afrontado.
Is that... a Pokémon, of some kind?
Um, is this some sort of joke, ~player~?
With all of these Trainers here, I'm already getting excited!
Wow, I didn't expect to find more Pokémon Trainers in a place like this!
Such strong trainers... It's like a dream come true!
What's this, the Strip Poker World Tournament or something like that?
Two Mistys?! This really is a weird place!
Whoa, he really ran away! Guess it must still be too painful for him...
O-oh, hi, Misty! It's nice to see you again! Even if it is in a place like this...
Oh, is that one of your other outfits, Elesa? Since you are a model, you must have a ton of different clothes!
(This feeling... It's just like when I faced Iris!)
(This woman... She is not your average trainer...)
(I did not expect to meet with a Pokémon Champion here, out of all places!)
Wait, again?! What are the odds?
Aw, come on, Misty. I'm sure us girls can have fun by ourselves, too!
(Whoa... This guy is so intense, I can feel it!)
Wait, I almost didn't recognize you in that outfit! You're Misty, from Kanto! It's nice to see you again!
Alola? Oh, I see, you are from the Alola region!
Oh, what's this? A rare Vivillon pattern? Or maybe a shiny Beautifly?
Sólo espero que, al final de la partida, el Inventario siga en pie...
Strip poker against a model... I only hope I can keep up!
Oh, I have an outfit that totally matches with the atmosphere of this place! I'll wear it next time I come here!
No, I can't say I do... wait, is there supposed to be something else there?
Wait, the car is playing? I, uh, is that allowed?
How does a car play strip poker? I have to see this for myself.
Whoa, this place really takes me back!
It's just like the one in Pokéstar Studios!
Wait, are we being filmed right now?
Whoa, that's a lot of people here!
Are... are all of these people here to watch us play?
What is this place? Did we end up in Undella Town?
A private beach? Whoa, the person behind the Inventory must be super rich!
This is such a nice weather! After this, I'm gonna go for a walk.
(Is this one of those dreams where I'm back in the Trainers' School?)
Huh, this classroom reminds me to the one back home in Aspertia.
Hold on, whose house is this?
Aren't we intruding?
I hope the owner doesn't catch us in the middle of playing...
This is a really weird place for a card game.
Guess I gotta watch out for Lampents and such...
Only four players at this table, huh? This is like the Battle Royal from Alola...
Oh, are you a Pokémon Trainer too? Nice to meet you!
I see, so I'm not the only Trainer here today, huh?
Hugh was right, this really is a place where people come to play strip poker...
This is my first time in a place like this, s-so I'm not completely sure what to expect...
Nah, I'm all good.
These cards are all I need!
No need for a switch!
I'll keep what I have, thanks.
I already have a well-built team.
Nope, I'm all set!
Just take all of these...
For this, I'll need a completely new strategy.
Gotta swap the whole team...
Guess I'll have to rethink my whole strategy...
Eh, it's better if I start from scratch. Give me five cards...
I may have to start from zero again, but I won't give up! Dealer, five cards!
Now it's time for ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I choose ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
Dealer, I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
Hmm... Let's switch ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I'm gonna go for... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ will bring me victory!
I'll have, um, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please.
Hmm... ~cards.text~, please.
Let me think... ~cards.text~.
U-um, ~cards.text~.
I hope that ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ are enough...
Oh, I've got this! At least I hope I do, I can't see my cards very well...
Just so you know, I'm not losing this one.
Now it's my chance!
If I keep getting hands like this one, I'll win for sure!
I'm starting strong!
Ooh, is this beginner's luck?
(Maybe I should have brought a jacket or something... No, wait, I'd have to take it off anyways.)
I got this!
This seems like a good match-up!
Looks like luck is on my side!
I got this!
With these cards, there's no way I'll lose!
Oh, I'm just getting started!
I think I made the right prediction!
I'm starting to get the hang of this!
I have endured. Now it's time for my reversal!
I'm not done yet!
It's all or nothing!
Yes! Time for my comeback!
Nice, I really needed these!
With such a beautiful sun, there is no way I can lose!
The sun is shining, and so do my cards!
Sunlight is a key factor for the growth of Grass-type Pokémon, but it also makes people feel better!
Alright, seems like I still have a Last Resort!
Brr... I hope I don't catch a cold!
These should be enough.
I can make these work.
A good Trainer can build a strong team from any kind of Pokémon... er, cards, in this case.
Pokemon Trainers usually rely on the bond between them and their Pokémon to win. But here, luck is what matters the most...
Playing not to lose is a bit weird, but I think I have it figured out.
Will something like this work?
At this point, there is no choice but to go forward.
Could be better, could be worse.
Usually, I try not to leave things to chance, but...
About as reliable as Focus Blast.
I also checked the regular, not-strip-poker table, but it was a bit too expensive. For that much money, I could buy a lot of Full Restores!
This is pretty fun! Well, not as fun as Pokémon battles, but it's a close second!
You know, sometimes I wish my shorts had pockets in them. Sometimes I even forget what I'm carrying in my bag!
Yet again, it all comes down to luck...
Ah, what happens next? I can't wait!
This uncertainty is making me nervous...
I m-may not have much left, but I won't give up!
Um... could you not stare so... intensely at me? I'm getting a bit nervous...
Wait, I can still take my hair ties off! Um, but maybe it's a bit late for that...
I'll think I'll be able to pass this round.
I'm going to lose another round to a toilet. I... don't think I can describe how it feels.
Gah, bad luck from the get go...
Argh! What a slow start!
Uh, so, none of you live alongside Pokémon, huh? That sounds so weird! I can't imagine what my life would be without them!
M-maybe I'm getting a bit... distracted, by all the noises in this place...
Now that I think about it, this place seems a bit barren. Maybe a bit of greenery could help?
Can't believe they didn't even put a potted plant up here...
With a bit of work, I think you could set a really nice garden here! But no, instead it's just an empty space! Such a waste of potential...
Apparently, the Gym Leader of Virbank City, Roxie, also comes here, but I haven't seen her yet.
Eh, I'm just starting.
It would be easier to win with a team of six Unowns...
It's actually my first time in a place like this, since gambling is illegal in Unova... but I guess we aren't in Unova anymore.
I can 100% trust my Pokémon team to do their best. This hand, not so much...
Wait, maybe this is a super secret and super rare combination of cards! Uh, I hope...
I can still take a loss or two.
Whoa, that switch was not good at all.
When I heard about this place, I thought it had to be some kind of prank, but, nope, it's real!
I miss Volt Switch right now...
I think I'd rather rely on Sheer Cold than on these cards...
What kind of trainer would I be if I couldn't work my way around a disadvantage?
If I used Trick Room, would this become a winner hand?
I hope I can win...
I think... that I may be overthinking this game!
Uhhhhhhh...
Is it time already?
Guess I should mentally prepare...
Oh, I'm gonna have to...
Well, if t-this is all I get...
I only need to beat one of you, s-so I'll be fine!
Well, even Fissure lands sometimes.
B-but this was supposed to be my comeback!
Gotta say, it's a bit annoying how much luck matters here...
What? Oh.
I think I'd rather be having a Pokémon battle right now...
I guess that when it drizzles, it pours...
I still have much to learn...
I once failed a type chart exam because I answered that Rock resisted itself. Not my proudest moment...
Ah, I'm starting to miss the sunlight...
This place could use some more natural sunlight... bigger windows, or maybe even a glass ceiling?
For a forest, this is a very dreary place... I guess the stars are pretty, at least?
Hmm... I think I'd rather be in Pinwheel Forest than here... not a fan of the dead trees.
Wha- what? But you seemed, well, not normal, but also not a zombie either!
Well, my goal is to become a better Pokémon Trainer, and to meet lots of people. Is that what you sensed?
Anal? Is it better or worse than, uh, the normal way? Because, honestly, I have no experience with either...
Hmm... No, there isn't a place in Unova that's this cold, May. Wait, maybe Icirrus City in winter?
Hmm... No, I don't think I recognize this place, May.
Yeah, I'm pretty sure that plant is made of plastic...
Well, there was that time my Cryogonal missed three Blizzards in a row and I ended up losing to Iris again. Eh, you're right, dying is probably worse.
France? It doesn't sound familiar...
Oh, Unova's climate is pretty hot, so I definitely prefer warm temperatures!
Oh, I like all Grass-type Pokémon, but Serperior is my favorite! Did you know it can store solar energy and convert it into power?
Wait, wait, a daughter? I didn't know about any of this!
Huh, I didn't know anything about you having a daughter! Wait, not having a daughter, I mean.
And you say her name is Verity? Now I'm curious...
Oh, you can grow flowers out of nowhere? That's so cool!
Oh, growing a branch as a seat? Nice idea, I'm a bit tired myself.
Heh. That would be pretty interesting! Actually, wait. Do you think the Inventory counts as another universe?
Why would you use your hoodie? Wouldn't it be more normal to carry them in Pokéballs?
Sure, I'll donate if it's for a good cause! Do you accept Pokédollars?
Sometimes I do listen to the wild Chatots, but most of the time they just repeat random words...
Wait, you are married?! I never thought... hold on, wives? And I don't even have a girlfriend...
Hm, you're right, Nagisa. I hope it's just drinks, and not...
Uh, no scars there. In fact, you look... very nice, Nagisa.
Oh, uh, maybe you could just... tell that person? Although I don't have any experience in dating myself, so I don't know if this helps...
Oh hey, happy birthday, Jason!
Oh, sometimes people recognize me from my movies. I think that's pretty cool!
(Wait, if Tharja can change the size of boobs with her magic, maybe hers weren't originally that big...)
Oh, in my world, we call money Pokédollars. Or just money, since it's the same currency for all the regions.
Whoa! I'm an only child, so I can't even begin to imagine what having thousands of sisters is like!
Huh, I've been filmed, but I haven't been painted yet! Sure, why not?
A painting? M-maybe later, when I get back my clothes...
I'm okay... Seems like Aimee is skilled with her gun, if nothing else...
Actually, this is my first time playing poker! But I made sure to read the rules, so I should be okay!
Hmm... pretty much never. I like starting the day strong, and waking up with the sun is the best way to do it!
Oh, don't worry! You belong to Bobobo already, so it's not like I could steal you away from him!
Sure! I mean, I don't know what Pokémonopoly is, but it sounds fun!
Um, no. It's actually my first time here!
Oh, that's an easy one! Magcargo is the evolved form of Slugma!
Spheres? I'm not a big fan of football, but I think the ball is more... egg-shaped, than round.
And besides, there are some things you just have to experience for yourself! Like Pokémon battles!
This really is a weird place for a cards game... Then again, in Unova we have a special train for Pokémon battles, so...
I'm actually not a big fan of books. Learning by doing is just so much more fun!
It's a good thing we are playing this game inside of this cabin; the fireplace really helps make it feel warm and cozy. Much better than the raging storm outside...
(I was kinda hoping there wouldn't be anyone from Unova. What are the odds?)
Just you and me. A-are you nervous?
Honestly, I am a bit surprised I even got this far.
I can feel it! Victory is right before my eyes!
By the way, I'm Rosa, and I'm a Pokémon Trainer. Nice to meet you all!
It feels a bit weird seeing no Pokémon in a beach... No Wingull flying, no Frillish in the water...
What?! But this is my iconic hairstyle! Without it, I'm just a generic Pokémon Trainer!
Oh, don't worry, I didn't bring any Pokémon with me! And, well, even if I did, they are well trained, so you wouldn't have to worry!
Well, I do help others train... their Pokémon. They are the ones that do the actual fighting.
Animals? Can't say I know that word. Is that what you call Pokémon in Mejare?
I'm... not sure I follow. Are you maybe a fan of my movies?
Oh, Pokémon tend to be pretty friendly, so I'm not worried! And besides, as long as I have my team by my side, I'm not afraid of anything!

{smaller}Oh! First, I should explain what a Pokémon is. Well, Pokémon are creatures from my world, all with different forms and powers. They coexist with humans, like me, in different ways. Some people do jobs alongside Pokémon, some keep them as pets, some dedicate themselves to studying and researching them... And some, like me, are Pokémon Trainers. We catch Pokémon, care for and train them, and battle with them against another Trainers. That's basically it!{!reset}
Yeah, that's right! We just keep meeting in the weirdest of places, don't we?
Oh, yes! Hmm... I'd say I'm the kind of trainer who always seeks to improve, and who wants to be best buddies with her Pokémon!
Oh, so you have noticed it too! Do they... make you hungry, Jessie?
Well, I haven't given up on becoming Champion yet! But I thought becoming a Gym Leader and facing all kinds of Trainers would help me get stronger.
Oh, I have! I have known my Serperior since it was a Snivy, and since Unova doesn't have a Grass-type gym anymore, that's what I went for!
Hmm, sure, why not? I don't think I have ever changed my hairstyle, so it will be fun to experiment.
Hmm, I've been talking with Drayden about taking the Opelucid Gym for myself. He's a bit reluctant to retire, but I'm sure I'll end up convincing him.
You might think that, but I haven't had much luck... or, well, any luck at all.
Can't believe I threw my lead like that...
I thought I was doing well, but it seems I still have much to learn about the game.
How? How did I lose?
But I thought I was safe!
Wait, I had a pair! I didn't think...
I think I should have aimed for a higher pair.
Ah! It's like the opponent got a critical hit!
I may have lost a bit of my advantage, but I'm still in the lead!
Don't tell me there's entry hazards here, too?
Just like Stealth Rock, I lost right off the bat...
No! My win streak!
Well, I had a good streak.
Ah, just when I had the tempo advantage...
This is just a small setback. I'll be back on the winning track in no time!
To be honest, up to this point I feel like I was a bit overdressed for a place like this.
Guess I'll... join you guys. N-not in masturbating, though! Yet, anyway...
Well, it seems that I still have more clothes than anyone else, so why not?
I can take this off, no problem.
Well, for my first time, I'm doing well, don't you think?
My t-shirt is a small price to pay for the win.
Ah, I'm getting more nervous by the minute!
Guess I'll have to join you guys...
I hope I can keep being in the lead...
I suppose that, even if I am winning, undressing is inevitable in a game like this...
Usually, you bet money in Pokémon battles. Playing for clothes is a first time for me.
I'll recover in no time!
If I can do this, I won't be afraid of anything!
Oh no, all that I have left is my underwear...
Gotta be brave, gotta be brave...
I can't get used to this.
I'm still not entirely sure about how this stripping thing works, but...
F-for victory, I'll give it my all!
This is...
Hmm... Shorts or t-shirt?
Can't believe I'm playing strip poker against a car... and losing!
It's such a sunny day, how am I doing this poorly?
Damn, I'm getting swept here!
Unlucky streaks may come, but I will always try my hardest!
Have I lost this much momentum?
Wow, I'm not d-doing well at all...
I am actually trying to win, I promise! It's just... these stupid c-cards don't want me to!
A-ah, I'm no good at this...
Starting with a handicap? No matter!
Even if I start at a disadvantage, I can still come out on top!
It doesn't matter how it starts, what matters is how it ends!
I may be in a disadvantage, but you shouldn't underestimate me!
I've been in worse situations and still come out ahead.
A-as long as I'm here, I won't give up!
N-no matter what, a Trainer must keep their cool in a pinch!
Here I go, showing my tits to a bunch of people...
It's like I'm getting swept by Haxorus all over again...
B-but my bra is next!
Ah... But I'm still in the game! I can still win!
Damn, it feels like I'm facing a full team of Pokémon with only three of my own...
Why did I let myself get talked into this...
Eh, I shouldn't expect to do well in my first time anyways...
Ah, I'm gonna lose...
Me? Ah, no way...
Having to get naked is...
I-if you think that I'm going to run away j-just because it's embarrassing, then you're wrong!
Don't worry, I thrive under pressure.
Hah! You think I'd run away from a challenge?
Hmm... Well, mostly, because it's fun. The Pokémon enjoy battling, and so do the trainers!
Well, Pokémon battles are usually for fun, and no one gets seriously hurt or anything like that. So it's fine!
Hmm, I've heard some novice Trainers can have some troubles with that, but it's never happened to me. Guess I'm just that cool!
You sure can! I pet my Serperior all the time, and she's never bit me!
Well, I'm still working hard to get stronger! Recently, I've been looking into becoming a Gym Leader. I think it will be a great opportunity to face all kinds of people!
Of course! Trust is a very important element in Pokémon battles! After all, they are the ones battling.
My other costume is even cuter than this one! Instead of the cap, I wear a red hat, with a fuzzy ball at the end and all.
When I was younger, I starred in movies with my Pokémon. For the special effects, they had a green screen, just like this one.
In the first movie I starred in, I played the role of the Riolu girl.
In other movie, I was a princess, trapped in a mysterious land by the evil queen Bellelba.
Another movie I had fun filming was the Titanic Tyranitar.
But my favorite role was the one I had in the Full Metal Cop series.
But that doesn't make it any less embarrassing...
Let's get rid of the small things first.
Even if they are just accessories, my hat and my Xtransceiver should still count, right? As a ''layer'', I mean.
When I learned about the Inventory, I knew that I had to see the place for myself!
Actually, part of the reason I came to the Inventory is because I am looking for a date... Am I weird for that?
This is starting to get a bit...
Aaah... This is more embarrassing than I expected...
I'm getting kinda low on HP...
I c-can't believe I'm doing this...
I think I'm more nervous than when I was facing Ghetsis...
Oh, I don't earn any money from the films! It all goes to the crew who makes the movies, actually.
Yeah! Maybe I could show you a Pokémon battle later, so you can see it for yourself!
Oh, I know! Maybe you and I could have a battle! Then I could show you how fun Pokémon battling is!
O-oh, I see... M-maybe you could help me with that?
Ah, I hope I don't step on... something nasty.
It was fun, seeing the difference between the acting and the movie itself.
I was a hero, valiantly stopping the evil schemes of the mischievous Brycen-Man!
The outfit was cute, and I got to meet Sabrina, a gym leader from Kanto.
Facing such a big monster... It was amazing, even if it was just a prop.
I played the part of an evil ninja thief, who faced a robotic cop in a never-ending duel of fates. It was so cool!
I may have been a bit unlucky until this point, but if you overlook me because of that, you'll be surprised!
Okay, I can do this.
Hope I don't step on my Xtransceiver on accident...
I mean, a place where you can meet with people from other universes? How could I not want to go?
I, um, hope not...
Can't say that I'm looking forward to getting much more naked...
The clothes pile is getting kinda big.
This is not how I expected this day to go at all...
Hold on a moment...
Um, could you give me some time?
I-I'm going to need a bit of time for this...
W-well, this is it. Do you like what you see?
T-this will be my last stand!
One more loss and...
No more room for errors.
Oh, you don't have much on you, huh, ~player~?
Oh, ~player~. Actually, considering I never met him, you might be my real father... Let's just not think about it.
You are...~name~, right? Huh, I have a friend that's called the same as you!
Ghetsis was... well, evil is an understatement. So it's no wonder he reacted like that!
Wha- So soon? I-I'm not prepared for...
Okay, this time I'm prepared. Go on, Bobobo!
Alright, third time is the charm! I'll see your dick, no matter what! (Wait, why am I so invested in this?)
Oh, so you can actually speak! So, do you make noises for fun, or...
One step closer to victory!
Ah, is the game still ongoing?
Phew, it's not my turn yet...
At least I'm not the one who lost...
Well, at least I'm not the focus of attention!
Oh, what's ~name~ gonna take off?
Your turn to impress us, ~name~.
Well, better you than me, ~name~.
Please pick something big...
I'm still undefeated!
Well, what will you go for?
Wait, is that all you are wearing to this game, ~player~?
Whoa, you look like you spend a lot of time training your body! You must be proud of those muscles!
Oh, we share the same name! That's a neat coincidence, don't you think?
Oh, that's a pretty unique hair color! Did you dye or is it naturally like that? Either way, it looks good on you!
Wait, are the two of you supposed to be the same person? Maybe one of you is a Ditto...
Huh, that could be neat. I could learn information about Pokémon super fast!
Ah, it's Default-Chan's turn, desu. Gah, now I'm saying it, too!
Huh, I knew there were electric-type Pokémon, but I had never seen an electric-type human before! I wonder, how exactly do your powers work?
Wait, you aren't even wearing clothes, so what exactly are you going to do?
Wait, do your flowers count as a layer?
Whoa, you sound really smart! What's the source of your knowledge, Wikipe-tan?
Huh... that makes sense, actually! It should be standardized, like how a full team can't have more than six Pokémon.
Well, it doesn't look like any of us has too much of an advantage... unless someone is wearing, like, several pairs of underwear, or something like that.
Two Mistys... Which is the real one? Wait, maybe they are both real... but from parallel universes?
O-oh, don't worry, I won't look!
I won't look! I promise!
Well, at least you still have clothes to strip...
Huh, you were doing pretty well! At least, compared to me...
I didn't know I was such a good poker player! Wait, was this my Hidden Ability all along?
Oh, ~name~ has to strip again... Well, you can still make a comeback!
Oh, this game is a bit unfair...
Wait, ~name~ has to strip again? Oh...
Whoa, this really was a competitive round!
I suppose that all that matters is not having the worst hand, huh?
One step closer to victory!
Yes, ~name~ lost!
Ah, it's ~name~'s turn! This will be a nice experience!
Don't worry, it's not so bad!
Losing can be fun too, ~name~.
Alright, it's ~name~'s turn to catch up.
Hey, at least you can't get more naked than I already am...
H...hey, something big, please...
(Ah, I hope ~name~ takes off something big...)
Go ahead, ~name~... Show me more...
Oh, ~name~ lost?
Yay! Safe!
Alright, ~name~! It's your turn to be under the spotlight!
Well, ~name~? What's it going to be?
Please! Help a fellow girl in need!
Yes, I'm safe!
Phew...
Thanks, ~name~... I really c-can't afford to lose now!
Alright, I can endure a bit longer...
Maybe y-you could try to match me?
I'm still undefeated!
Now that I think about it, I probably should have brought my bag.
I still haven't thought up a strategy, but I guess it's fine, since I haven't lost yet.
Not a lot of options left, huh, ~name~?
Please, don't make this longer than it needs to be...
Wow, if I had a pokédollar for every time a tie happened, I'd have two pokédollars - which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.
I guess ties must be pretty common in poker. You almost never see them in Pokémon battles.
Wait, what happens now?
A tie? What are the odds...?
Oh, are you taking your ~clothing~ now? I thought you were going to keep it...
Yeah, makes sense that something like that would go first.
Just some chip damage.
Eh, nothing of consequence. Yet.
I suppose stalling is a strategy as valid as any other.
Not too fast paced, I see.
A bit of a gap, but nothing I can't come back from.
If you get cocky, I'll close the gap in no time!
Wait, something that small counts?
I lost, and you still had your ~clothing~...
Ah, I was completely defeated.
Still stalling at this point in the game?
I'll do better next time!
I'm like this and you still had your ~clothing~? That's just unfair...
Ah, you still had something like that?
I was hoping for a more even match...
At least do it quickly...
Just so you know, I've come back from worse! Well, that only happens sometimes...
Well, that's no help at all.
Come on, give me something to work with!
Whoa, she just... floated away. I, uh, I don't think she's coming back.
(After the game, I should go to the Royal Unova for the Rare Candy prize...)
Wait a moment, you only took off your hat? But I thought...
Those glasses... nah, too normal to be Choice Specs.
A tie... Those really give an air of seriousness. Maybe that's why Cheren wears his?
Sorry if I sound a bit obsessed with Pokémon... ever since I became a Gym Leader, I spend most of my time either battling aspiring trainers or training my team.
(I hope I can keep making up the distance like this...)
Well, as long as I'm not the one getting naked...
You should take something bigger next time, y'know, since I'm almost naked...
Gah, guess I'll have to rely on my imagination then...
Come on, I'm done already, so there's no need for you to stall...
On to the next round, I suppose...
Seems like I'll stay sticky for a while...
Anyways, let's continue the game.
In a Pokémon battles, I favor an offensive approach, but here, I'd rather have a slow game...
(So if I pair a Rampardos and an Aggron, I'll get an Aggron with Rock Head. And then...)
(Which move is better: Aqua Tail or Waterfall?)
(I should go buy the Blizzard TM at Lacunosa Town, but those things are expensive...)
On to the next round, then...
Eh, being a Gym Leader, it's not the first time I'm at a disadvantage.
You should take something bigger next time, y'know, since I'm already naked...
It's still a long shot, but I won't surrender!
You... certainly seem eager to do this.
It may not be my first encounter with a ghost, but I didn't expect to be playing strip poker with one.
